site.title: AI Model Forge - Custom AI Training & Development
site.description: Expert AI model training and development services. We help businesses build custom AI solutions tailored to their needs.
site.keywords: AI training, machine learning, AI development, custom AI models, AI consulting

hero.headline: Transform Your Business with Custom AI Models
hero.subheadline: Expert training and development services for cutting-edge AI solutions tailored to your unique needs.

about.title: About AI Model Forge
about.description: We specialize in training and developing state-of-the-art AI models that solve real-world business challenges. Our team of experts combines deep technical knowledge with industry insights to deliver custom AI solutions that drive measurable results.
about.highlight: Trusted by leading companies to build production-ready AI systems

features.title: Lightning Fast Training
features.description: Optimized infrastructure ensures your models train efficiently, reducing time-to-production.

features.title: Custom Solutions
features.description: Every model is tailored to your specific use case, data, and business requirements.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-level security protocols protect your data and intellectual property throughout the process.

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive monitoring and analytics to track model performance in real-time.

features.title: Continuous Optimization
features.description: Ongoing model refinement and updates to maintain peak performance as data evolves.

features.title: Expert Support
features.description: Dedicated AI specialists provide guidance from concept to deployment and beyond.

services.title: Model Training
services.description: End-to-end training services for machine learning and deep learning models using your data.

services.title: Fine-Tuning
services.description: Optimize existing models for your specific domain and use cases with advanced fine-tuning techniques.

services.title: Custom Development
services.description: Build AI systems from scratch, designed specifically for your business processes and workflows.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Strategic AI consulting to identify opportunities and create actionable roadmaps for AI adoption.

services.title: Deployment
services.description: Seamless deployment services to get your models into production with scalable infrastructure.

services.title: Maintenance
services.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your AI systems continue performing optimally.

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your AI development needs

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: AI Model Forge transformed our customer service operations with a custom NLP model. The results exceeded our expectations, and the team's expertise was invaluable.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Their model training services are top-notch. We've deployed multiple models that are performing exceptionally well in production. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.content: The custom recommendation engine they built increased our conversion rates by 35%. Their team understood our business needs from day one.
